name: In The Dead Of Night (itch)
description:
In the dead of nigh you're awaken by a mysterious message - a nobleman was murdered and you're tasked with questioning the suspects. You'll have to follow your gut to figure out who can and cannot be trusted. 

The game takes about 15 minutes to get through and has 8 different endings. 

Made with Unity, using the Fungus plug-in. All music & sounds are downloaded from Freesound.org and are not owned by me. The graphics including speech boxes, character sprites and backgrounds were produced from scratch using Procreate on IPad. The fonts used in the game are Text In Gothic and Philosopher.
